auth.docs:
Enables a simple *Digest* authentication with username and password.
  * **username** (**Required**, string): The username to use for authentication.
  
  * **password** (**Required**, string): The password to check for authentication.
  
  

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

password.docs:
**, string**: The password to check for authentication.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

username.docs:
**, string**: The username to use for authentication.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

css_include.docs:
**, local file**: Path to local file to be included in web server index page. Contents of this file will be served as `/0.css` and used as CSS stylesheet by internal webserver. Useful when building device without internet access, where you want to use built-in AP and webserver.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

css_url.docs:
**, url**: The URL that should be used for the CSS stylesheet. Defaults to [https://esphome.io/_static/webserver-v1.min.css](https://esphome.io/_static/webserver-v1.min.css) (updates will go to `v2`, `v3`, etc). Can be set to empty string.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

enable_private_network_access.docs:
**, boolean**: Enables support for [Private Network Access](https://wicg.github.io/private-network-access) and the [Private Network Access Permission Prompt](https://wicg.github.io/private-network-access/#permission-prompt). Defaults to `true`.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for code generation.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

include_internal.docs:
**, boolean**: Whether `internal` entities should be displayed on the web interface. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

js_include.docs:
**, local file**: Path to local file to be included in web server index page. Contents of this file will be served as `/0.js` and used as JS script by internal webserver. Useful when building device without internet access, where you want to use built-in AP and webserver.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

js_url.docs:
**, url**: The URL that should be used for the JS script. Defaults to [https://esphome.io/_static/webserver-v1.min.js](https://esphome.io/_static/webserver-v1.min.js). Can be set to empty string.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

local.docs:
**, boolean**: Include supporting javascript locally allowing it to work without internet access. Defaults to `false`.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

log.docs:
**, boolean**: Turn on or off the log feature inside webserver. Defaults to `true`.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

ota.docs:
**, boolean**: Turn on or off the OTA feature inside webserver. Strongly not suggested without enabled authentication settings. Defaults to `true`. Cannot be used with the `esp-idf` framework.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

port.docs:
**, int**: The port the web server should open its socket on.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

sorting_groups.docs:
**, list**: Available only on `version: 3`. A list of group ID’s and names to group the entities. See [Webserver Entity Grouping](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#config-webserver-grouping).
  * **id** (**Required**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)): Manually specify the ID used for the group.
  
  * **name** (**Required**, string): A string representing the group name which is displayed as the header of the group
  
  * **sorting_weight** (*Optional*, float): A float representing the weight of the group. A group with a smaller `sorting_weight` will be displayed first. Defaults to `50`
  
  

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID used for the group.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

name.docs:
**, string**: A string representing the group name which is displayed as the header of the group

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

sorting_weight.docs:
**, float**: A float representing the weight of the group. A group with a smaller `sorting_weight` will be displayed first. Defaults to `50`

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*

version.docs:
**, string**: `1`, `2` or `3`. Version 1 displays as a table. Version 2 uses web components and has more functionality. Version 3 uses HA-Styling. Defaults to `2`.

*See also: [Web Server Component](https://esphome.io/components/web_server.html#configuration-variables)*
